sentence: The 10-year cumulative risk of contralateral breast cancer in TP53 carriers was significantly higher than that in non-carrier (17.9% vs 3.6%, hazard ratio (HR) = 7.0, 95% CI:3.3–14.9, P < 0.001) (Fig. 1).

The 10-year cumulative risk of contralateral breast cancer in TP53 carriers was significantly higher than that in non-carrier (17.9% vs 3.6%, hazard ratio (HR) = 7.0, 95% CI:3.3–14.9, P < 0.001) (Fig. 1).

The 10-year cumulative risk of contralateral breast cancer in TP53 carriers was significantly higher than that in non-carrier (17.9% vs 3.6%, hazard ratio (HR) = 7.0, 95% CI:3.3–14.9, P < 0.001) (Fig. 1).
